C0F39480DFE3013133AE68A86D17958E.description: Evaluate own ability to select resources that are engaging and appropriate for personal interests and needs.

C0F34F80DFE3013133AD68A86D17958E.description: Develop personal criteria for gauging how effectively own ideas are expressed.

C0F30A70DFE3013133AC68A86D17958E.description: Interpret new information based on cultural and social context.

C0F2C340DFE3013133AB68A86D17958E.description: Recognize how to focus efforts in personal learning.

C0F27590DFE3013133AA68A86D17958E.description: Recognize the limits of own personal knowledge.

C0F17F00DFE3013133A768A86D17958E.description: Practice safe and ethical behaviors in personal electronic communication and interaction.

C0F128A0DFE3013133A668A86D17958E.description: Seek opportunities for pursuing personal and aesthetic growth.

C0F0D140DFE3013133A568A86D17958E.description: Recognize that resources are created for a variety of purposes.

C0F08480DFE3013133A468A86D17958E.description: Participate in the social exchange of ideas, both electronically and in person.

C0EFEED0DFE3013133A268A86D17958E.description: Show an appreciation for literature by electing to read for pleasure and expressing an interest in various literary genres.

C0EF9C70DFE3013133A168A86D17958E.description: Maintain openness to new ideas by considering divergent opinions, changing opinions or conclusions when evidence supports the change, and seeking information about new ideas encountered through academic or personal experiences.

C0EF50E0DFE3013133A068A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate motivation by seeking information to answer personal questions and interests, trying a variety of formats and genres, and displaying a willingness to go beyond academic requirements.

C0EF0B60DFE30131339F68A86D17958E.description: Display curiosity by pursuing interests through multiple resources.

C0EE6160DFE30131339D68A86D17958E.description: Use creative and artistic formats to express personal learning.

C0EE1790DFE30131339C68A86D17958E.description: Use social networks and information tools to gather and share information.

C0EDCD70DFE30131339B68A86D17958E.description: Organize personal knowledge in a way that can be called upon easily.

C0ED7EC0DFE30131339A68A86D17958E.description: Connect ideas to own interests and previous knowledge and experience.

C0ED27D0DFE30131339968A86D17958E.description: Seek information for personal learning in a variety of formats and genres.

C0ECD4C0DFE30131339868A86D17958E.description: Respond to literature and creative expressions of ideas in various formats and genres.

C0EC7840DFE30131339768A86D17958E.description: Read widely and fluently to make connections with self, the world, and previous reading.

C0EC23A0DFE30131339668A86D17958E.description: Read, view, and listen for pleasure and personal growth.

C0EB3180DFE30131339368A86D17958E.description: Assess own ability to work with others in a group setting by evaluating varied roles, leadership, and demonstrations of respect for other viewpoints.

C0EADC00DFE30131339268A86D17958E.description: Assess the quality and effectiveness of the learning product.

C0EA9070DFE30131339168A86D17958E.description: Assess the processes by which learning was achieved in order to revise strategies and learn more effectively in the future.

C0E9EF00DFE30131338F68A86D17958E.description: Respect the principles of intellectual freedom.

C0E988B0DFE30131338E68A86D17958E.description: Use information and knowledge in the service of democratic values.

C0E93670DFE30131338D68A86D17958E.description: Contribute to the exchange of ideas within and beyond the learning community.

C0E8EF10DFE30131338C68A86D17958E.description: Create products that apply to authentic, real-world contexts.

C0E8A6B0DFE30131338B68A86D17958E.description: Use knowledge and information skills and dispositions to engage in public conversation and debate around issues of common concern.

C0E85DE0DFE30131338A68A86D17958E.description: Respect the differing interests and experiences of others, and seek a variety of viewpoints.

C0E814E0DFE30131338968A86D17958E.description: Solicit and respect diverse perspectives while searching for information, collaborating with others, and participating as a member of the community.

C0E76FA0DFE30131338768A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate teamwork by working productively with others.

C0E72A40DFE30131338668A86D17958E.description: Show social responsibility by participating actively with others in learning situations and by contributing questions and ideas during group discussions.

C0E6E3D0DFE30131338568A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate leadership and confidence by presenting ideas to others in both formal and informal situations.

C0E653D0DFE30131338368A86D17958E.description: Use information and technology ethically and responsibly.

C0E5AA20DFE30131338168A86D17958E.description: Use technology and other information tools to organize and display knowledge and understanding in ways that others can view, use, and assess.

C0E560A0DFE30131338068A86D17958E.description: Use writing and speaking skills to communicate new understandings effectively.

C0E51440DFE30131337F68A86D17958E.description: Participate and collaborate as members of a social and intellectual network of learners.

C0E4BD60DFE30131337E68A86D17958E.description: Conclude an inquiry-based research process by sharing new understandings and reflecting on the learning.

C0E40180DFE30131337C68A86D17958E.description: Share knowledge and participate ethically and productively as members of our democratic society.

C0E30C10DFE30131337968A86D17958E.description: Reflect on systematic process, and assess for completeness of investigation.

C0E2C0F0DFE30131337868A86D17958E.description: Determine how to act on information (accept, reject, modify).

C0E22F30DFE30131337668A86D17958E.description: Use valid information and reasoned conclusions to make ethical decisions.

C0E1E050DFE30131337568A86D17958E.description: Consider diverse and global perspectives in drawing conclusions.

C0E19B50DFE30131337468A86D17958E.description: Connect understanding to the real world.

C0E111D0DFE30131337268A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate personal productivity by completing products to express learning.

C0E0CA20DFE30131337168A86D17958E.description: Employ a critical stance in drawing conclusions by demonstrating that the pattern of evidence leads to a decision or conclusion.

C0E07900DFE30131337068A86D17958E.description: Use both divergent and convergent thinking to formulate alternative conclusions and test them against the evidence.

C0E019B0DFE30131336F68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate flexibility in the use of resources by adapting information strategies to each specific resource and by seeking additional resources when clear conclusions cannot be drawn.

C0DF6AB0DFE30131336D68A86D17958E.description: Use the writing process, media and visual literacy, and technology skills to create products that express new understandings.

C0DF0DF0DFE30131336C68A86D17958E.description: Collaborate with others to exchange ideas, develop new understandings, make decisions, and solve problems.

C0DEA560DFE30131336B68A86D17958E.description: Use technology and other information tools to analyze and organize information.

C0DDEEC0DFE30131336A68A86D17958E.description: Use strategies to draw conclusions from information and apply knowledge to curricular areas, real-world situations, and further investigations.

C0DD9F00DFE30131336968A86D17958E.description: Organize knowledge so that it is useful.

C0DD59C0DFE30131336868A86D17958E.description: Continue an inquiry-based research process by applying critical-thinking skills (analysis, synthesis, evaluation, organization) to information and knowledge in order to construct new understandings, draw conclusions, and create new knowledge.

C0DCD1B0DFE30131336668A86D17958E.description: Draw conclusions, make informed decisions, apply knowledge to new situations, and create new knowledge.

C0DC8BF0DFE30131336568A86D17958E.description: Seek appropriate help when it is needed.

C0DC3D90DFE30131336468A86D17958E.description: Monitor gathered information, and assess for gaps or weaknesses.

C0DBFB00DFE30131336368A86D17958E.description: Use interaction with and feedback from teachers and peers to guide own inquiry process.

C0DBB730DFE30131336268A86D17958E.description: Monitor own information-seeking processes for effectiveness and progress, and adapt as necessary.

C0DAC070DFE30131335F68A86D17958E.description: Contribute to the exchange of ideas within the learning community.

C0DA52A0DFE30131335E68A86D17958E.description: Follow ethical and legal guidelines in gathering and using information.

C0DA0340DFE30131335D68A86D17958E.description: Seek divergent perspectives during information gathering and assessment.

C0D9BB30DFE30131335C68A86D17958E.description: Respect copyright/intellectual property rights of creators and producers.

C0D921C0DFE30131335A68A86D17958E.description: Display persistence by continuing to pursue information to gain a broad perspective.

C0D8C950DFE30131335968A86D17958E.description: Display emotional resilience by persisting in information searching despite challenges.

C0B4E7B0DFE30131335868A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate adaptability by changing the inquiry focus, questions, resources, or strategies when necessary to achieve success.

C0B4A250DFE30131335768A86D17958E.description: Maintain a critical stance by questioning the validity and accuracy of all information.

C0B452A0DFE30131335668A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate creativity by using multiple resources and formats.

C0B40070DFE30131335568A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate confidence and self-direction by making independent choices in the selection of resources and information.

C0B3ACE0DFE30131335468A86D17958E.description: Display initiative and engagement by posing questions and investigating the answers beyond the collection of superficial facts.

C0B2E400DFE30131335268A86D17958E.description: Collaborate with others to broaden and deepen understanding.

C0B297C0DFE30131335168A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate mastery of technology tools for accessing information and pursuing inquiry.

C0B25580DFE30131335068A86D17958E.description: Make sense of information gathered from diverse sources by identifying misconceptions, main and supporting ideas, conflicting information, and point of view or bias.

C0B21320DFE30131334F68A86D17958E.description: Read, view, and listen for information presented in any format (e.g., textual, visual, media, digital) in order to make inferences and gather meaning.

C0B1CF20DFE30131334E68A86D17958E.description: Evaluate information found in selected sources on the basis of accuracy, validity, appropriateness for needs, importance, and social and cultural context.

C0B184A0DFE30131334D68A86D17958E.description: Find, evaluate, and select appropriate sources to answer questions.

C0B13360DFE30131334C68A86D17958E.description: Develop and refine a range of questions to frame the search for new understanding.

C0B0E390DFE30131334B68A86D17958E.description: Use prior and background knowledge as context for new learning.

C0B09910DFE30131334A68A86D17958E.description: Follow an inquiry-based process in seeking knowledge in curricular subjects, and make the real-world connection for using this process in own life.

C0B00270DFE30131334868A86D17958E.description: Inquire, think critically, and gain knowledge.
